title: LoL not respecting Windows Mouse Sideness Setting.
body:
When changing the mouse button assignment to left handed in the windows control panel, the change will not be picked up by League of Legends.
Various Threads suggest editing the input.ini which does not work anymore. (See http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3002334 or http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/044RLRAO-swapping-mouse-buttons for example).
Furthermore there is no option to swap the mouse buttons inside the League Client and you cant even rebind mouse button 1. I'm kinda lost here.
Can somebody point me to the right direction?

sl33kz

replies.body: Even though your bindings on your OS are set to left handed, some keys in League are reserved and cannot be changed.  Hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can look into possible options for you.  We'll respond asap!
